references.paper_title: Only a matter of style: age transformation using a style-based regression model
references.reason: This paper introduces SAM, a foundational model for global age transformation that MyTimeMachine builds upon, demonstrating the significance of style-based regression in age manipulation.

This work, FADING, presents a state-of-the-art approach to age transformation using diffusion models, providing a strong comparative baseline and highlighting the challenges in achieving high-quality identity-preserving results.

references.paper_title: A Style-Based Generator Architecture for Generative Adversarial Networks
references.reason: StyleGAN2, the core architecture underlying MyTimeMachine, provides a robust generative model capable of high-fidelity image generation, which forms the basis for the personalized age transformation.

references.paper_title: Prompt-to-Prompt Image Editing with Cross Attention Control
references.reason: This paper introduces the p2p method, used by FADING for age editing, offering insights into diffusion model manipulation and highlighting the importance of addressing the inversion-editability trade-off.

references.paper_title: DreamBooth: Fine Tuning Text-to-Image Diffusion Models for Subject-Driven Generation
references.reason: DreamBooth offers a crucial naive personalization technique for comparing against MyTimeMachine, enabling personalized age transformation through fine-tuning on personal photo collections and showcasing limitations in naive personalization.
